00019 #ifndef __UTIL_MATH_H__
00020 #define __UTIL_MATH_H__
00021 
00022 /* Math
00023  *
00024  * Basic math functions on scalar and vector types. This header is used by
00025  * both the kernel code when compiled as C++, and other C++ non-kernel code. */
00026 
00027 #ifndef __KERNEL_OPENCL__
00028 
00029 #define _USE_MATH_DEFINES
00030 
00031 #include <float.h>
00032 #include <math.h>
00033 #include <stdio.h>
00034 
00035 #endif
00036 
00037 #include "util_types.h"
00038 
00039 CCL_NAMESPACE_BEGIN
00040 
00041 /* Float Pi variations */
00042 
00043 #ifndef M_PI_F
00044 #define M_PI_F      ((float)3.14159265358979323846264338327950288)
00045 #endif
00046 #ifndef M_PI_2_F
00047 #define M_PI_2_F    ((float)1.57079632679489661923132169163975144)
00048 #endif
00049 #ifndef M_PI_4_F
00050 #define M_PI_4_F    ((float)0.785398163397448309615660845819875721)
00051 #endif
00052 #ifndef M_1_PI_F
00053 #define M_1_PI_F    ((float)0.318309886183790671537767526745028724)
00054 #endif
00055 #ifndef M_2_PI_F
00056 #define M_2_PI_F    ((float)0.636619772367581343075535053490057448)
00057 #endif

00060 
00061 #ifdef _WIN32
00062 
00063 #ifndef __KERNEL_GPU__
00064 
00065 #if(!defined(FREE_WINDOWS))
00066 #define copysignf(x, y) ((float)_copysign(x, y))
00067 #define hypotf(x, y) _hypotf(x, y)
00068 #define isnan(x) _isnan(x)
00069 #define isfinite(x) _finite(x)
00070 #endif
00071 
00072 #endif

00074 #ifndef __KERNEL_OPENCL__
00075 
00076 __device_inline float fmaxf(float a, float b)
00077 {
00078     return (a > b)? a: b;
00079 }
00080 
00081 __device_inline float fminf(float a, float b)
00082 {
00083     return (a < b)? a: b;
00084 }
00085 
00086 #endif
00087 
00088 #endif
00089

00093 {
00094     return (a > b)? a: b;
00095 }
00096

00098 {
00099     return (a < b)? a: b;

00124 __device_inline float min4(float a, float b, float c, float d)
00125 {
00126     return min(min(a, b), min(c, d));
00127 }
00128 
00129 __device_inline float max4(float a, float b, float c, float d)
00130 {
00131     return max(max(a, b), max(c, d));
00132 }

00135 
00136 __device_inline int clamp(int a, int mn, int mx)
00137 {
00138     return min(max(a, mn), mx);
00139 }
00140 
00141 __device_inline float clamp(float a, float mn, float mx)
00142 {
00143     return min(max(a, mn), mx);
00144 }

00148 __device_inline float signf(float f)
00149 {
00150     return (f < 0.0f)? -1.0f: 1.0f;
00151 }
00152 
00153 __device_inline float nonzerof(float f, float eps)
00154 {
00155     if(fabsf(f) < eps)
00156         return signf(f)*eps;
00157     else
00158         return f;
00159 }

00161 /* Float2 Vector */
00162 
00163 #ifndef __KERNEL_OPENCL__
00164 
00165 __device_inline bool is_zero(const float2 a)
00166 {
00167     return (a.x == 0.0f && a.y == 0.0f);
00168 }
00169 
00170 #endif
00171 
00172 #ifndef __KERNEL_OPENCL__
00173 
00174 __device_inline float average(const float2 a)
00175 {
00176     return (a.x + a.y)*(1.0f/2.0f);
00177 }
00178 
00179 #endif
00180 
00181 #ifndef __KERNEL_OPENCL__
00182 
00183 __device_inline float2 operator-(const float2 a)
00184 {
00185     float2 r = {-a.x, -a.y};
00186     return r;
00187 }
00188 
00189 __device_inline float2 operator*(const float2 a, const float2 b)
00190 {
00191     float2 r = {a.x*b.x, a.y*b.y};
00192     return r;
00193 }
00194

00196 {
00197     float2 r = {a.x*f, a.y*f};
00198     return r;
00199 }
00200 
00201 __device_inline float2 operator*(float f, const float2 a)
00202 {
00203     float2 r = {a.x*f, a.y*f};
00204     return r;
00205 }
00206 
00207 __device_inline float2 operator/(float f, const float2 a)
00208 {
00209     float2 r = {f/a.x, f/a.y};
00210     return r;
00211 }
00212 
00213 __device_inline float2 operator/(const float2 a, float f)
00214 {
00215     float invf = 1.0f/f;
00216     float2 r = {a.x*invf, a.y*invf};
00217     return r;
00218 }
00219

00221 {
00222     float2 r = {a.x/b.x, a.y/b.y};

00269     a.x *= invf;
00270     a.y *= invf;
00271     return a;

00275 __device_inline float dot(const float2 a, const float2 b)
00276 {
00277     return a.x*b.x + a.y*b.y;
00278 }
00279 
00280 __device_inline float cross(const float2 a, const float2 b)
00281 {
00282     return (a.x*b.y - a.y*b.x);
00283 }
00284 
00285 #endif

00289 __device_inline float len(const float2 a)
00290 {
00291     return sqrtf(dot(a, a));
00292 }
00293 
00294 __device_inline float2 normalize(const float2 a)
00295 {
00296     return a/len(a);
00297 }
00298 
00299 __device_inline float2 normalize_len(const float2 a, float *t)
00300 {
00301     *t = len(a);
00302     return a/(*t);
00303 }
00304 
00305 __device_inline bool operator==(const float2 a, const float2 b)
00306 {
00307     return (a.x == b.x && a.y == b.y);
00308 }
00309 
00310 __device_inline bool operator!=(const float2 a, const float2 b)
00311 {
00312     return !(a == b);
00313 }

00316 {

00318     return r;

00324     return r;

00328 {
00329     return min(max(a, mn), mx);

00333 {

00362 /* Float3 Vector */
00363 
00364 __device_inline bool is_zero(const float3 a)
00365 {
00366     return (a.x == 0.0f && a.y == 0.0f && a.z == 0.0f);
00367 }
00368 
00369 __device_inline float average(const float3 a)
00370 {
00371     return (a.x + a.y + a.z)*(1.0f/3.0f);
00372 }
00373 
00374 #ifndef __KERNEL_OPENCL__
00375 
00376 __device_inline float3 operator-(const float3 a)
00377 {
00378     float3 r = make_float3(-a.x, -a.y, -a.z);
00379     return r;
00380 }
00381

00383 {
00384     float3 r = make_float3(a.x*b.x, a.y*b.y, a.z*b.z);
00385     return r;
00386 }
00387

00389 {

00391     return r;

00397     return r;

00400 __device_inline float3 operator/(float f, const float3 a)
00401 {
00402     float3 r = make_float3(f/a.x, f/a.y, f/a.z);
00403     return r;

00410     return r;

00472 __device_inline float dot(const float3 a, const float3 b)
00473 {
00474     return a.x*b.x + a.y*b.y + a.z*b.z;
00475 }

00477 __device_inline float3 cross(const float3 a, const float3 b)
00478 {
00479     float3 r = make_float3(a.y*b.z - a.z*b.y, a.z*b.x - a.x*b.z, a.x*b.y - a.y*b.x);
00480     return r;
00481 }

00569 __device_inline bool is_zero(const float4& a)
00570 {
00571     return (a.x == 0.0f && a.y == 0.0f && a.z == 0.0f && a.w == 0.0f);
00572 }
00573 
00574 __device_inline float average(const float4& a)
00575 {
00576     return (a.x + a.y + a.z + a.w)*(1.0f/4.0f);
00577 }
00578

00655 
00656 __device_inline float dot(const float4& a, const float4& b)
00657 {
00658     return a.x*b.x + a.y*b.y + a.z*b.z + a.w*b.w;
00659 }
00660 
00661 __device_inline float4 cross(const float4& a, const float4& b)
00662 {
00663     float4 r = {a.y*b.z - a.z*b.y, a.z*b.x - a.x*b.z, a.x*b.y - a.y*b.x, 0.0f};
00664     return r;
00665 }
00666 
00667 __device_inline float4 min(float4 a, float4 b)
00668 {
00669     return make_float4(min(a.x, b.x), min(a.y, b.y), min(a.z, b.z), min(a.w, b.w));
00670 }
00671 
00672 __device_inline float4 max(float4 a, float4 b)
00673 {
00674     return make_float4(max(a.x, b.x), max(a.y, b.y), max(a.z, b.z), max(a.w, b.w));
00675 }

00714 __device_inline void print_int3(const char *label, const int3& a)
00715 {
00716     printf("%s: %d %d %d\n", label, a.x, a.y, a.z);
00717 }
00718 
00719 #endif

00724 
00725 __device_inline int4 operator>=(float4 a, float4 b)
00726 {
00727     return make_int4(a.x >= b.x, a.y >= b.y, a.z >= b.z, a.w >= b.w);
00728 }
00729 
00730 #endif

00736     printf("%s: %d %d %d %d\n", label, a.x, a.y, a.z, a.w);

00741 /* Int/Float conversion */
00742 
00743 #ifndef __KERNEL_OPENCL__
00744 
00745 __device_inline unsigned int as_uint(float f)
00746 {
00747     union { unsigned int i; float f; } u;
00748     u.f = f;
00749     return u.i;
00750 }
00751 
00752 __device_inline int __float_as_int(float f)
00753 {
00754     union { int i; float f; } u;
00755     u.f = f;
00756     return u.i;
00757 }
00758 
00759 __device_inline float __int_as_float(int i)
00760 {
00761     union { int i; float f; } u;
00762     u.i = i;
00763     return u.f;
00764 }
00765 
00766 __device_inline uint __float_as_uint(float f)
00767 {
00768     union { uint i; float f; } u;
00769     u.f = f;
00770     return u.i;
00771 }
00772 
00773 __device_inline float __uint_as_float(uint i)
00774 {
00775     union { uint i; float f; } u;
00776     u.i = i;
00777     return u.f;
00778 }

00780 /* Interpolation */
00781 
00782 template<class A, class B> A lerp(const A& a, const A& b, const B& t)
00783 {
00784     return (A)(a * ((B)1 - t) + b * t);
00785 }
00786 
00787 /* Triangle */
00788 
00789 __device_inline float triangle_area(const float3 v1, const float3 v2, const float3 v3)
00790 {
00791     return len(cross(v3 - v2, v1 - v2))*0.5f;
00792 }
00793 
00794 #endif
00795 
00796 /* Orthonormal vectors */
00797 
00798 __device_inline void make_orthonormals(const float3 N, float3 *a, float3 *b)
00799 {
00800     if(N.x != N.y || N.x != N.z)
00801         *a = make_float3(N.z-N.y, N.x-N.z, N.y-N.x);  //(1,1,1)x N
00802     else
00803         *a = make_float3(N.z-N.y, N.x+N.z, -N.y-N.x);  //(-1,1,1)x N
00804 
00805     *a = normalize(*a);
00806     *b = cross(N, *a);
00807 }
00808 
00809 /* Color division */
00810 
00811 __device_inline float3 safe_divide_color(float3 a, float3 b)
00812 {
00813     float x, y, z;
00814 
00815     x = (b.x != 0.0f)? a.x/b.x: 0.0f;
00816     y = (b.y != 0.0f)? a.y/b.y: 0.0f;
00817     z = (b.z != 0.0f)? a.z/b.z: 0.0f;
00818 
00819     return make_float3(x, y, z);
00820 }
